title: Oyster and sausage stuffing
ingredients: ['450g pork sausage meat', '450g spicy pork sausage meat', '450g plain croutons', '570g shucked oysters, drained with liquid reserved', '240g diced celery', '2 eggs, beaten', '40g chopped onion', '350ml chicken stock, or as needed', '110g butter, melted']
